links.content:
[Skip to content](#primary)

United Bags: 800-550-BAGS (2247) M-F: 8am - 5pm CST ★Sun Coast: 800-785-0201 M-F: 8am - 5pm EST★Acadia: 337-783-8182 M-F: 8am - 5pm CST

### Since 1890

# Packaging Solutions Built on Trust

Over the years, we created bulk packaging solutions with increasing capabilities that serve your production and shipping needs.

[Inquire Today](https://unitedbags.com/contact-us/)

# Food Grade Manufacturing and Warehouses

Global Food Safety Initiative (GFSI): BRC, AIB, SQF, C-TPAT

[UBI Advantage](https://unitedbags.com/ubi-advantage/)

# Driven to Provide the Best Customer Experience

United Bags is dedicated to supporting our customers by providing the most diverse choice of packaging products in the industry.

[Inquire Today](https://unitedbags.com/contact-us/)

# Over 130 Years of Packaging Experience

Technical sales team and dedicated customer service representatives

[Our Culture](https://unitedbags.com/about-us/)

## [BUILD A BAG FREE Vendor Managed Inventory United Bags Audited Manufacturers Global Supply Chain Experts (C-TPAT) Food Grade: BRC / AIB / SQF / GFSI ](/build-a-fibc/)

## [WHO IS UNITED BAGS? ![Our Culture Page](/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/Our-Culture-Video.jpg) Explore our identity through an engaging video on Our Culture page.  Our Culture  ](/about-us/)

## [WHY UNITED BAGS?](/ubi-advantage/)

[FREE Vendor Managed Inventory](/ubi-advantage/#vendor-managed-inventory)

[United Bags Audited Manufacturers](/ubi-advantage/)

[Global Supply Chain Experts (C-TPAT)](/ubi-advantage/#supply-chain-management)

[Food Grade: BRC / AIB / SQF / GFSI](/ubi-advantage/#certifications)

![Previous Slide](/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/icons8-arrow-50-5.png) ![Next Slide](/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/icons8-arrow-50-3.png)

700,000

Sq ft. of warehouse space located in Missouri, Michigan, and Louisiana, along with domestic and global warehouse partners 

100,000,000+

Bags sold each year 

12+ BILLION

Pounds of customer products moved each year in United Bags packaging 

20+ MILLION 

Bags in stock 

# Our Range of Products Include:

![FIBC BAGS](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/UP.png)

FIBC BAGS

[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/fibcs/)

FIBC BAGS

Bulk bags (also known as jumbo bags, super sacks and big bags) are extremely versatile.

  * Food, Pharmaceutical and Industrial Industries
  * Cost effective
  * Holds dry flowable materials



[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/fibcs/)

![MODIFIED ATMOSPHERE PACKAGING](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/MAP.jpg)

MODIFIED ATMOSPHERE PACKAGING

[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/modified-atmosphere-packaging/)

MODIFIED ATMOSPHERE PACKAGING

Keeps your product fresh when handling high cost and spoilage products

  * Extend the shelf life of your product
  * Sustain and enhance product quality
  * Control O2, CO2, and N levels



[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/modified-atmosphere-packaging/)

![MULTIWALL PAPER BAGS](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/UP-1.png)

MULTIWALL PAPER BAGS

[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/multiwall-paper-bags/)

MULTIWALL PAPER BAGS

Offers recyclability, strength and durability.

  * Holds 20-50 pounds of product
  * 100% biodegradable and recyclable
  * Multi-color printing for branding
  * Food and pharmaceutical grade



[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/multiwall-paper-bags/)

![BOPP BAGS](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/ub-bopp-img-1.png)

BOPP BAGS

[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/bopp-bags/)

BOPP BAGS

Biaxially Oriented Polypropylene bags offer strength, durability and is cost effective.

  * 100% recyclable
  * Moisture, oil, and grease resistant
  * Food and pharmaceutical grade
  * High quality graphic printing



[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/bopp-bags/)

![POLYPROPYLENE BAGS](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Group-2759.png)

POLYPROPYLENE BAGS

[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/polypropylene-bags/)

POLYPROPYLENE BAGS

Durable, cost effective, recyclable material with a great deal of flexibility and strength to protect your product

  * Puncture and tear resistant
  * Multi-color printing for branding
  * Variety of sizes, colors, and styles



[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/polypropylene-bags/)

![POLYETHYLENE BAGS](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Group-2760.png)

POLYETHYLENE BAGS

[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/polyethylene-bags/)

POLYETHYLENE BAGS

Provides great tensile strength, clarity, flexibility, recyclability, and water barrier along with being cost effective

  * Product visibility
  * High quality graphic printing
  * Variety of sizes, colors, and styles



[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/polyethylene-bags/)

![CONTAINER LINERS](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/Untitled-design-25.png)

CONTAINER LINERS

[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/container-liners-flexitanks-and-flexi-ibcs/)

CONTAINER LINERS

Liners protect product from moisture, contamination, and ensure safe and hygienic transportation

  * Cost efficient
  * Custom design to fit any size container
  * Minimizes handling of bulk product



[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/container-liners-flexitanks-and-flexi-ibcs/)

![TELLAP BAGS](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/ub-tellap-img-1.png)

TELLAP BAGS

[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/fibc-bags/#tellap)

TELLAP BAGS

Most advanced and cost-efficient pallet free bulk bag solution. Perfect for agriculture, food, and chemical industries

  * Simple and easy to use
  * Sustainable, 100% recyclable
  * Contamination free



[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/fibc-bags/#tellap)

![SANDBAGS](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Group-2762.png)

SANDBAGS

[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/sandbags/)

SANDBAGS

Our in-stock sandbags are made from Woven Polypropylene, UV treated for extended life, and come in a variety of sizes from 50 to 2200 pounds.

  * Quantity Discounts
  * Same day shipping available
  * Easy tie string closure



[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/sandbags/)

![MESH/CRAWFISH BAGS](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/BOPP-1.jpg)

MESH/CRAWFISH BAGS

[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/mesh-crawfish-bags/)

MESH/CRAWFISH BAGS

Our customizable Mesh Bags come in many sizes and colors.

  * Draw string closure
  * Print band available
  * Agriculture, shellfish, firewood, litter bag



[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/mesh-crawfish-bags/)

![PACKAGING ACCESSORIES](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/BOPP-2.jpg)

PACKAGING ACCESSORIES

[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/packaging-accessories/)

PACKAGING ACCESSORIES

We can provide you with a variety of packaging accessories.

  * Stretchwrap
  * Pallets
  * Tape & Thread
  * Slip Sheets



[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/packaging-accessories/)

![SMALL BAG SOLUTIONS](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Group-2762.png)

SMALL BAG SOLUTIONS

[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/small-bag-solutions/)

SMALL BAG SOLUTIONS

Explore how different bag types can be produced in the same styles.

  * Multiwall Paper Bags
  * BOPP or Woven Polypropylene (WPP)
  * Polyethylene



[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/small-bag-solutions/)

![United Bags Logo](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/UB-Logo-1-1.png)

## Bulk Packaging Solutions Since 1890

With the highest quality manufacturing facilities worldwide, United Bags is the bulk packaging industry leader with flexibility to manufacture and supply all styles and types of industrial bags. Our experienced sales team will work with you to find the right bag for your product and provide technical expertise.

[Request a Quote](/ubi-advantage/)

  * Over 130 Years of Industry Experience
  * Manufactures Worldwide
  * Custom and Stock Inventory
  * 100% Guarantee
  * FDA Approved Fabric
  * AIB and BRC Certified Facilities
  * ISO 9001:2000 Certified



customerservice@unitedbags.com

[United Bags: 800-550-BAGS (2247)](tel:8005502247)

[Sun Coast: 800-785-0201](tel:8007850201)

[Acadia: 337-783-8182](tel:3377838182)




[Request a Quote![Arrow](/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/icons8-arrow-30.png)](/contact-us/)

# Packaging Solutions Built on Trust

Over the years, we created bulk packaging solutions with increasing capabilities that serve your production and shipping needs.

# Our Range of Products Include:

![FIBC BAGS](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/UP.png)

FIBC BAGS

[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/fibcs/)

FIBC BAGS

Bulk bags (also known as jumbo bags, super sacks and big bags) are extremely versatile.

  * Food, Pharmaceutical and Industrial Industries
  * Cost effective
  * Holds dry flowable materials



[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/fibcs/)

![MODIFIED ATMOSPHERE PACKAGING](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/MAP.jpg)

MODIFIED ATMOSPHERE PACKAGING

[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/modified-atmosphere-packaging/)

MODIFIED ATMOSPHERE PACKAGING

Keeps your product fresh when handling high cost and spoilage products

  * Extend the shelf life of your product
  * Sustain and enhance product quality
  * Control O2, CO2, and N levels



[Learn more >](https://unitedbags.com/modified-atmosphere-packaging/)

![MULTIWALL PAPER BAGS](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/UP-1.png)

Offers recyclability, strength and durability.

  * Multi-color printing for branding

# UBI ADVANTAGE

Experience the United Bags [Advantage](https://unitedbags.com/ubi-advantage/) for [FIBC](https://unitedbags.com/fibcs/) (Bulk Bags, Super Sacks) and [small bags](https://unitedbags.com/small-bag-solutions/) across a multitude of [industries](https://unitedbags.com/industries/).

Your browser does not support the video tag. 

United Bags Innovation Lab

## Trusted Packaging Solutions from United Bags

United Bags is your partner for high-quality, customizable packaging solutions. Our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction ensures you will receive the best products tailored to your specific needs. Whether you are looking for durable, cost effective, or eco-friendly options, we have a solution for you. Connect with us to learn more!

[Inquire Today](https://unitedbags.com/get-in-touch/)

#### Not all manufacturers are equal.

United Bags is committed to sourcing from only the top global manufacturers. Our team personally audits our partners to ensure they meet our standards. We continuously review our partners based on several criteria:

**Ownership:** Our partners bring ideas to improve products and educate our team on industry trends.

**Sustainability:** Depending on the product our partners can help design a product to be Recyclable, Biodegradable, or Compostable.

**Certifications:** In addition to meeting our audit standards we require our partners to have additional 3rd party certifications such as BRC, AIB, SQF, FSS 22000, and ISO 21898.

**Quality of Raw Materials:** Our partners use only the best virgin raw materials in addition to offering high quality sustainable options.

**Reinvestment in Equipment:** Outdated equipment results in higher cost and lower quality products. Our partners invest annually in state-of-the-art buildings and equipment.

**Workforce:** Each of our partners provides their staff with fair wages, training, and development resulting in less turnover and higher quality products.

**Quality Control Measures:** We require our partners to have rigorous quality control processes and procedures in place.

Do you know where your bags are made?

**United Bags provides the best quality at the best price.**

UBI audited, approved manufacturers

![polypropylene](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/19-1.png) ![bo-pp](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/13-1.png) ![super sack bags](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/14-1.png) ![bag manufacturer](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/15-1.png) ![bulk bag company](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/16-1.png) ![flexible packaging company](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/17-1.png) ![mesh bags](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/18-1.png)

Manufacturers others use

![](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/1-1.jpg) ![bag shipping](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/UB-Image-w-Caption.png) ![](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/3-1.jpg) ![](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/4-1.jpg) ![](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/5-1.jpg) ![](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/6-1.jpg)

UBI ADVANTAGE

Internal Innovation Lab and Sample Room 

United Bags’ cutting-edge innovation lab and sample room enables us to ensure your bags meet the exact specifications required.

Quality Control:

  * We check not only the bags we provide to you but can test bags provided by another company.



Faster Response Time:

  * In-House testing allows us to quickly identify and address any quality issues, reducing the risk of delays and downtime.



Innovation:

  * Our product engineers can reduce the cost of your current bag while keeping the same quality, structural integrity, and performance.



Vendor Managed Inventory (VMI) and Just-in-Time (JIT) Programs 

Our FREE Vendor Managed Inventory (VMI) and Just-In-Time (JIT) programs ensure you never run out of bags while improving your cash flow.

Eliminate the Fear of Overseas Sourcing:

  * Our team will design a custom stocking program eliminating the concern over lead times.



Fast Delivery:

  * Typically 1-2 business days from one of our four warehouses.



**Food Grade Warehousing** :

  * Our warehouses follow the guidelines of the Global Food Safety Initiative (GFSI), ensuring your bags are safely stored.



**Space Saving** :

  * Free up production space at your facility knowing your bags are only a few days away.



**Strengthen Your Cash Flow** :

  * We will not invoice you until we ship the bags to your facility.



Printing Press 

Our in-house two-color flexographic printing is ideal for short runs or last-minute emergencies.

  * Minimum run of 1,000 bags
  * Choose from several different styles and size bags, such as Woven Polypropylene bags, BOPP, Paper/Polypropylene Combo and Multiwall paper.
  * Short lead times



Product Design 

  * United Bags partners with custom design companies that can help you create packaging designs from scratch or update your current design.
  * Create designs with up to 10 color printing.



Certifications 

**United Bags has the following certifications to keep your product safe.**

C-TPAT (Customs-Trade Partnership Against Terrorism):

  * Provides greater security and efficiency throughout the supply chain. C-TPAT is an audited program run by the U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) agency to strengthen the security of the international supply chain. As a member of C-TPAT, United Bags has implemented security guidelines for its facilities, vehicles, and personnel; as well as ensuring suppliers and partners meet C-TPAT security standards.



Safe Quality Food (SQF):

  * Safe Quality Food (SQF) and C-TPAT certifications for secure supply chain, ensuring the quality of your bag.



EcoVadis:

  * Being certified with EcoVadis, United Bags is committed to sustainability, social responsibility, risk management and partnering with vendors who have the same guiding principles.



Technology 

**United Bags custom built state-of-the-art technology results in a best-in-class customer experience.**

Fast Turnaround:

  * Go from product design to pricing and placing your order in 24 hours.



Best in Class Customer Service:

  * Full transparency with easy access to your orders, inventory levels, and other important information.



Accurate Order Fulfillment:

  * All products are barcoded resulting in accurate customer inventory and same day shipping.



Increased Flexibility:

  * We proactively adjust to changes in your needs or the market.



Supply Chain Management 

Ensuring the integrity of your bags is our number one priority. At United Bags, our freight team manages the delivery of all our products from the manufacturer to you.

International Freight:

  * We work directly with freight forwarders and manufacturing partners to track and ensure the safety of the over 1,000 containers we import annually.
  * United Bags C-TPAT (Customs-Trade Partnership Against Terrorism) certification minimizes delays and potential contamination of your product from inspection.



Domestic Freight:

  * Each of our warehouses has a freight specialist to coordinate the delivery of your goods typically in 1-2 business days.
  * We have several freight options on each delivery to minimize cost and travel time.



## Discover Trusted Bulk Packaging Solutions with United Bags

United Bags is your premier partner for high-quality, customizable bulk packaging solutions. Our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction ensures that you receive the best products tailored to your specific needs. Whether you're looking for durable, efficient, or eco-friendly options, our diverse range of products and services cater to various industries. Connect with us to explore our offerings and elevate your custom packaging with one of our experienced sales team members!

[Inquire Today](https://unitedbags.com/get-in-touch/)

# INDUSTRIES

Experience the United Bags [Advantage](https://unitedbags.com/ubi-advantage/) for [FIBC](https://unitedbags.com/fibcs/) (Bulk Bags, Super Sacks) and [small bags](https://unitedbags.com/small-bag-solutions/) across a multitude of [industries](https://unitedbags.com/industries/).

## **THE UBI ADVANTAGE**

  * Food/Pharmaceutical grade certified manufacturing facilities 
    * BRC, AIB, ISO, SQF
    * Annual United Bags and 3rd party audits
    * Stringent vendor approval process
  * Safe Quality Food (SQF) and C-TPAT certifications to ensure the safety and quality of your products
  * Our sales team has over 200 years of experience across a wide variety of industries
  * Global sourcing from multiple countries
  * [Sustainable options](https://unitedbags.com/sustainability/) for all bag types
  * Ability to test FIBCs including the Safe Working Load in our Innovation Lab
  * Research & Development team to provide new ideas
  * In-house two-color flexographic printing is ideal for short runs as small as 1,000 or last-minute emergencies



## Learn more about the UBI Advantage

[UBI Advantage](https://unitedbags.com/ubi-advantage/)

#### **Vendor Managed Inventory (VMI)**

Allow us to design a FREE VMI program for you. Take the hassle out of lead times by storing your bags at one of our warehouses and releasing them for just in time delivery.

# UBI ADVANTAGE

Experience the United Bags [Advantage](https://unitedbags.com/ubi-advantage/) for [FIBC](https://unitedbags.com/fibcs/) (Bulk Bags, Super Sacks) and [small bags](https://unitedbags.com/small-bag-solutions/) across a multitude of [industries](https://unitedbags.com/industries/).

Your browser does not support the video tag. 

United Bags Innovation Lab

## Trusted Packaging Solutions from United Bags

United Bags is your partner for high-quality, customizable packaging solutions. Our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction ensures you will receive the best products tailored to your specific needs. Whether you are looking for durable, cost effective, or eco-friendly options, we have a solution for you. Connect with us to learn more!

[Inquire Today](https://unitedbags.com/get-in-touch/)

#### Not all manufacturers are equal.

United Bags is committed to sourcing from only the top global manufacturers. Our team personally audits our partners to ensure they meet our standards. We continuously review our partners based on several criteria:

**Ownership:** Our partners bring ideas to improve products and educate our team on industry trends.

**Sustainability:** Depending on the product our partners can help design a product to be Recyclable, Biodegradable, or Compostable.

**Certifications:** In addition to meeting our audit standards we require our partners to have additional 3rd party certifications such as BRC, AIB, SQF, FSS 22000, and ISO 21898.

**Quality of Raw Materials:** Our partners use only the best virgin raw materials in addition to offering high quality sustainable options.

**Reinvestment in Equipment:** Outdated equipment results in higher cost and lower quality products. Our partners invest annually in state-of-the-art buildings and equipment.

**Workforce:** Each of our partners provides their staff with fair wages, training, and development resulting in less turnover and higher quality products.

**Quality Control Measures:** We require our partners to have rigorous quality control processes and procedures in place.

Do you know where your bags are made?

**United Bags provides the best quality at the best price.**

UBI audited, approved manufacturers

![polypropylene](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/19-1.png) ![bo-pp](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/13-1.png) ![super sack bags](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/14-1.png) ![bag manufacturer](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/15-1.png) ![bulk bag company](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/16-1.png) ![flexible packaging company](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/17-1.png) ![mesh bags](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/18-1.png)

Manufacturers others use

![](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/1-1.jpg) ![bag shipping](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/UB-Image-w-Caption.png) ![](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/3-1.jpg) ![](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/4-1.jpg) ![](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/5-1.jpg) ![](https://www.unitedbags.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/6-1.jpg)

UBI ADVANTAGE

Internal Innovation Lab and Sample Room 

United Bags’ cutting-edge innovation lab and sample room enables us to ensure your bags meet the exact specifications required.

Quality Control:

  * We check not only the bags we provide to you but can test bags provided by another company.



Faster Response Time:

  * In-House testing allows us to quickly identify and address any quality issues, reducing the risk of delays and downtime.



Innovation:

  * Our product engineers can reduce the cost of your current bag while keeping the same quality, structural integrity, and performance.



Vendor Managed Inventory (VMI) and Just-in-Time (JIT) Programs 

Our FREE Vendor Managed Inventory (VMI) and Just-In-Time (JIT) programs ensure you never run out of bags while improving your cash flow.

Eliminate the Fear of Overseas Sourcing:

  * Our team will design a custom stocking program eliminating the concern over lead times.



Fast Delivery:

  * Typically 1-2 business days from one of our four warehouses.



**Food Grade Warehousing** :

  * Our warehouses follow the guidelines of the Global Food Safety Initiative (GFSI), ensuring your bags are safely stored.



**Space Saving** :

  * Free up production space at your facility knowing your bags are only a few days away.



**Strengthen Your Cash Flow** :

  * We will not invoice you until we ship the bags to your facility.



Printing Press 

Our in-house two-color flexographic printing is ideal for short runs or last-minute emergencies.

  * Minimum run of 1,000 bags
  * Choose from several different styles and size bags, such as Woven Polypropylene bags, BOPP, Paper/Polypropylene Combo and Multiwall paper.
  * Short lead times



Product Design 

  * United Bags partners with custom design companies that can help you create packaging designs from scratch or update your current design.
  * Create designs with up to 10 color printing.



Certifications 

**United Bags has the following certifications to keep your product safe.**

C-TPAT (Customs-Trade Partnership Against Terrorism):

  * Provides greater security and efficiency throughout the supply chain. C-TPAT is an audited program run by the U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) agency to strengthen the security of the international supply chain. As a member of C-TPAT, United Bags has implemented security guidelines for its facilities, vehicles, and personnel; as well as ensuring suppliers and partners meet C-TPAT security standards.



Safe Quality Food (SQF):

  * Safe Quality Food (SQF) and C-TPAT certifications for secure supply chain, ensuring the quality of your bag.



EcoVadis:

  * Being certified with EcoVadis, United Bags is committed to sustainability, social responsibility, risk management and partnering with vendors who have the same guiding principles.



Technology 

**United Bags custom built state-of-the-art technology results in a best-in-class customer experience.**

Fast Turnaround:

  * Go from product design to pricing and placing your order in 24 hours.



Best in Class Customer Service:

  * Full transparency with easy access to your orders, inventory levels, and other important information.



Accurate Order Fulfillment:

  * All products are barcoded resulting in accurate customer inventory and same day shipping.



Increased Flexibility:

  * We proactively adjust to changes in your needs or the market.



Supply Chain Management 

Ensuring the integrity of your bags is our number one priority. At United Bags, our freight team manages the delivery of all our products from the manufacturer to you.

International Freight:

  * We work directly with freight forwarders and manufacturing partners to track and ensure the safety of the over 1,000 containers we import annually.
  * United Bags C-TPAT (Customs-Trade Partnership Against Terrorism) certification minimizes delays and potential contamination of your product from inspection.



Domestic Freight:

  * Each of our warehouses has a freight specialist to coordinate the delivery of your goods typically in 1-2 business days.
  * We have several freight options on each delivery to minimize cost and travel time.



## Discover Trusted Bulk Packaging Solutions with United Bags

United Bags is your premier partner for high-quality, customizable bulk packaging solutions. Our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction ensures that you receive the best products tailored to your specific needs. Whether you're looking for durable, efficient, or eco-friendly options, our diverse range of products and services cater to various industries. Connect with us to explore our offerings and elevate your custom packaging with one of our experienced sales team members!

[Inquire Today](https://unitedbags.com/get-in-touch/)
